adjective.description: Relating to or designating a Neanderthal hominid or similar Middle Palaeolithic hominid.

noun.description: A Neanderthal hominid or similar Middle Palaeolithic hominid.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in William Flower (1831–1899), zoologist and museum curator. From Neanderthal + -oid, after French néanderthaloïde, adjective.
